item.title: Projects
item.description: The Jesse Malone Quintet The Jesse Malone Quintet began as and continues to serve as my outlet for composition. The group plays almost exclusively original compositions. In this endeaver I sometimes try to bridge the gap between my two disparate interests, writing tunes inspired by, or at least named for, concepts from computing. The group regularly features: Jesse Malone - Trumpet/Flugelhorn Ben Dietschi - Tenor Saxophone Matt Newton - Piano

item.title: Shows
item.description: Sunday February 16, 2020 - Jesse Malone Quintet at The Rex Location: 194 Queen St. W, Toronto Time: 9:30pm February 24, 2020 - Malone/Feldman Trio at The Emmet Ray Location: 924 College Street, Toronto Time: 7:00pm Sunday March 22, 2020 - Malone/Feldman at the Tranzac Location: 292 Brunswick Ave, Toronto Time: 10:00pm
